# Internal Documentation

This directory contains internal maintainer documentation that is not part of the public-facing docs site.

## Contents

- **DOCUMENTATION-AUDIT-SUMMARY.md** - Complete record of the documentation audit performed on 2026-01-08
- **DOCUMENTATION-MAINTENANCE.md** - Best practices guide for maintaining TraceKit documentation

## Purpose

These files are for:

- Maintainers who need to understand documentation structure and processes
- Contributors who want to help improve documentation
- Auditors reviewing documentation completeness
- Historical record of major documentation improvements

## Not Included in Public Docs

These files are intentionally excluded from the MkDocs navigation to keep the public documentation focused on user needs. They remain in version control for reference.
